content.text: 检查一个数字是否能被另一个数字整除（余数为零）。Checks if one number is evenly divisible by another (remainder is zero)
如果dividend能被divisor整除则返回true，否则返回false。True if dividend is evenly divisible by divisor, false otherwise
当dividend或divisor不是数字时。When dividend or divisor is not a number
当divisor为零时（除零错误）。When divisor is zero (division by zero)

```ts
// Basic usage
isDivisible(12, 3); // -> true (12 ÷ 3 = 4 with remainder 0)
isDivisible(12, 5); // -> false (12 ÷ 5 = 2 with remainder 2)
isDivisible(15, 3); // -> true (15 ÷ 3 = 5 with remainder 0)
```

```ts
// Testing for even/odd numbers
isDivisible(8, 2); // -> true (8 is even)
isDivisible(7, 2); // -> false (7 is odd)
```

```ts
// Testing multiples
isDivisible(100, 10); // -> true (100 is a multiple of 10)
isDivisible(101, 10); // -> false (101 is not a multiple of 10)
```

```ts
// Edge cases
isDivisible(0, 5); // -> true (0 is divisible by any non-zero number)
isDivisible(5, 1); // -> true (any number is divisible by 1)
isDivisible(5, 0); // -> throws Error (division by zero)
```

```ts
// Negative numbers
isDivisible(-12, 3); // -> true (-12 ÷ 3 = -4 with remainder 0)
isDivisible(12, -3); // -> true (12 ÷ -3 = -4 with remainder 0)
isDivisible(-12, -3); // -> true (-12 ÷ -3 = 4 with remainder 0)
```

summary.text: 被除数。The number to be divided
除数。The number to divide by

text.comment:
Function:

isDivisible

Description:

检查一个数字是否能被另一个数字整除（余数为零）。Checks if one number is evenly divisible by another (remainder is zero)

Returns:

如果dividend能被divisor整除则返回true，否则返回false。True if dividend is evenly divisible by divisor, false otherwise

Throws:

当dividend或divisor不是数字时。When dividend or divisor is not a number

Throws:

当divisor为零时（除零错误）。When divisor is zero (division by zero)

Example:
// Basic usage
isDivisible(12, 3); // -> true (12 ÷ 3 = 4 with remainder 0)
isDivisible(12, 5); // -> false (12 ÷ 5 = 2 with remainder 2)
isDivisible(15, 3); // -> true (15 ÷ 3 = 5 with remainder 0)
Example:
// Testing for even/odd numbers
isDivisible(8, 2); // -> true (8 is even)
isDivisible(7, 2); // -> false (7 is odd)
Example:
// Testing multiples
isDivisible(100, 10); // -> true (100 is a multiple of 10)
isDivisible(101, 10); // -> false (101 is not a multiple of 10)
Example:
// Edge cases
isDivisible(0, 5); // -> true (0 is divisible by any non-zero number)
isDivisible(5, 1); // -> true (any number is divisible by 1)
isDivisible(5, 0); // -> throws Error (division by zero)
Example:
// Negative numbers
isDivisible(-12, 3); // -> true (-12 ÷ 3 = -4 with remainder 0)
isDivisible(12, -3); // -> true (12 ÷ -3 = -4 with remainder 0)
isDivisible(-12, -3); // -> true (-12 ÷ -3 = 4 with remainder 0)
